mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS id, p.user_id AS userId, p.title AS title, p.content AS content, p.image_url AS imageUrl, p.thumbnail AS thumbnail, p.like_count AS likeCount, EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM post_likes pl WHERE pl.user_id = #{userId} AND pl.post_id = p.id ) AS likedByUser FROM posts p;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM post_likes WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND post_id = #{postId}
